channel.description: Now that we’ve created a package for our code, let’s write the code for our “Hello Real World” application. Traditionally, a Python “Hello World” program is a single line of code, but for this example we’ll follow all of the object-oriented standards by creating a class and a method. Create a Class First, we need to create a source code file for our application. We’ll place this code inside of the src/hello package we’ve already created.
